column1: Little Goat Diner////I'm sure their food is great
column3: twice I've shown up to eat within their posted hours
column4: and twice I've been turned away
column5: the last time being nearly an hour before the time I was told over the phone that the kitchen would close.  I understand wanting to close up
column6: but don't post hours you don't intend to keep...  I guess my business wasn't good enough for them...
